Body:
"""Test get_tags_filtered."""
common.CommonFunctions.get_resource = MagicMock(side_effect=self.common.
    get_resource)
response = self.system.get_tags(array_id=self.conn.array_id, tag_name=
    'CI-TEST-NO-RESULT', storage_group_id='XX', num_of_storage_groups=1,
    num_of_arrays=3)
common.CommonFunctions.get_resource.assert_called_once_with(category=SYSTEM,
    resource_level=TAG, params={ARRAY_ID: self.conn.array_id, TAG_NAME:
    'CI-TEST-NO-RESULT', SG_ID: 'XX', SG_NUM: '1', ARRAY_NUM: '3'})
self.assertTrue(response)
self.assertIsInstance(response, dict)
self.assertIn(TAG_NAME, response.keys())
